column5:
SELECT
 	 f.NAME
 	,j.CITY_NAME 'юр.адрес' 
	,p.CITY_NAME 'почт. адр.' 
	,f.`FIRM_ID`
FROM 
	CITY AS p, 
    CITY AS j, 
    FIRM AS f 
WHERE 
	f.JUR_CITY_ID=j.CITY_ID 
AND f.POST_CITY_ID=p.CITY_ID
AND LOWER(f.NAME) 		LIKE LOWER('п€терочка%')
AND LOWER(j.CITY_NAME) 	LIKE LOWER('симферополь%')
AND LOWER(p.CITY_NAME) 	LIKE LOWER('%');
